question: Zachary did 53 push-ups and 14 crunches in gym class today. David did 17 more push-ups but 10 less crunches than zachary. How many push-ups and crunches did Zachary do?
response:
Zachary did 53 push-ups and 14 crunches.
David did 17 more push-ups than Zachary, so David did 53 + 17 = 70 push-ups.
David did 10 less crunches than Zachary, so David did 14 - 10 = 4 crunches.
The answer is Zachary did 53 push-ups and 14 crunches.
